headline: How do you tell if someone in tech is full of bs?
description:
I admit that I don't have a high EQ. I don't read the cues as fast as I should and that often leads to situations where I trust someone (a boss, a professor, a coworker, random person online) only to be disappointed that they are in fact full of bs.

One example is this website:

https://lifearchitect.ai/

Watching some of this guy's videos and browsing his website, I call bs. I guess what gave him away was three things:

- shiny, fancy, stock-image, YouTube videos

- Big claims and quoting himself on his frontpage

- Just the whole "I know all about AI and do consulting and speaking" and looking like a "news media showman".

I think there must be more ways to call bs on such people. Care to share yours?
